title: Topic 001 Question 001
body: You have two Hyper-V hosts named Host1 and Host2. Host1 has an Azure virtual machine named VM1 that was deployed by using a custom Azure Resource
You need to move VM1 to Host2.
options: From the Update management blade, click Enable.
From the Overview blade, move VM1 to a different subscription.
From the Redeploy blade, click Redeploy.
From the Profile blade, modify the usage location.
